attributes.action: Pressure local establishments to provide Baby Changing Facilities for dads
attributes.additional_details: In a society where we are encouraging men to get more involved, where we have changed 'mother and baby spaces' to be called 'parent and baby' and support single dads, it makes it very challenging when they cant even change their babies.
attributes.background: When my husband takes our child out he is unable to change her as many of the baby changing facilities are found in the female toilets.

rejection.details:
Petitions need to call on the Government or Parliament to take a specific action.

We understand that you're concerned about the lack of baby changing facilities for men, but we're not sure exactly what you'd like the Government or Parliament to do. 

You could start a new petition explaining clearly what you would like the Government or Parliament to do.
